Self.Wiki: Determines parameters related to joint capsules.

strCtrlBoneName.Wiki: Bone name to apply (valid only when the setting method is skeleton)

dmyPolyId.Wiki: Dummy poly ID to apply (valid only when the setting method is Dummy Polygon)

axisZ.Wiki: Axis pointing towards the target (so that it does not overlap with other axes)

axisY.Wiki: Axis treated as left/right rotation (so that it does not overlap with other axes)
